014
015package com.google.common.util.concurrent;
016
017import static com.google.common.util.concurrent.Internal.toNanosSaturated;
018
019import com.google.common.annotations.GwtIncompatible;
020import com.google.common.annotations.J2ktIncompatible;
021import java.time.Duration;
022import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
023import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
024import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
025import org.jspecify.annotations.Nullable;
026
027/**
028 * A {@link ScheduledExecutorService} that returns {@link ListenableFuture} instances from its
029 * {@code ExecutorService} methods. To create an instance from an existing {@link
030 * ScheduledExecutorService}, call {@link
031 * MoreExecutors#listeningDecorator(ScheduledExecutorService)}.
032 *
033 * @author Chris Povirk
034 * @since 10.0
035 */
036@J2ktIncompatible
037@GwtIncompatible
038public interface ListeningScheduledExecutorService
039    extends ScheduledExecutorService, ListeningExecutorService {
040
041  /** @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture) */
042  @Override
043  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> schedule(Runnable command, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
044
045  /**
046   * Duration-based overload of {@link #schedule(Runnable, long, TimeUnit)}.
047   *
048   * @since 29.0
049   */
050  default ListenableScheduledFuture<?> schedule(Runnable command, Duration delay) {
051    return schedule(command, toNanosSaturated(delay), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
052  }
053
054  /** @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture) */
055  @Override
056  <V extends @Nullable Object> ListenableScheduledFuture<V> schedule(
057      Callable<V> callable, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
058
059  /**
060   * Duration-based overload of {@link #schedule(Callable, long, TimeUnit)}.
061   *
062   * @since 29.0
063   */
064  default <V extends @Nullable Object> ListenableScheduledFuture<V> schedule(
065      Callable<V> callable, Duration delay) {
066    return schedule(callable, toNanosSaturated(delay), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
067  }
068
069  /** @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture) */
070  @Override
071  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(
072      Runnable command, long initialDelay, long period, TimeUnit unit);
073
074  /**
075   * Duration-based overload of {@link #scheduleAtFixedRate(Runnable, long, long, TimeUnit)}.
076   *
077   * @since 29.0
078   */
079  default ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(
080      Runnable command, Duration initialDelay, Duration period) {
081    return scheduleAtFixedRate(
082        command, toNanosSaturated(initialDelay), toNanosSaturated(period), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
083  }
084
085  /** @since 15.0 (previously returned ScheduledFuture) */
086  @Override
087  ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(
088      Runnable command, long initialDelay, long delay, TimeUnit unit);
089
090  /**
091   * Duration-based overload of {@link #scheduleWithFixedDelay(Runnable, long, long, TimeUnit)}.
092   *
093   * @since 29.0
094   */
095  default ListenableScheduledFuture<?> scheduleWithFixedDelay(
096      Runnable command, Duration initialDelay, Duration delay) {
097    return scheduleWithFixedDelay(
098        command, toNanosSaturated(initialDelay), toNanosSaturated(delay), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
099  }
100}
